protein.general_function: Involved in vesicle docking involved in exocytosis
protein.specific_function: May participate in the regulation of synaptic vesicle docking and fusion, possibly through interaction with GTP-binding proteins. Essential for neurotransmission and binds syntaxin, a component of the synaptic vesicle fusion machinery probably in a 1:1 ratio. Can interact with syntaxins 1, 2, and 3 but not syntaxin 4. May play a role in determining the specificity of intracellular fusion reactions

reference.reference_text: Gengyo-Ando K, Kitayama H, Mukaida M, Ikawa Y: A murine neural-specific homolog corrects cholinergic defects in Caenorhabditis elegans unc-18 mutants. J Neurosci. 1996 Nov 1;16(21):6695-702.
